description: Gauntlet is a fictional supervillain in the Marvel Comics universe. He is a member of the Dark Riders, employed by Apocalypse, and is one of the Inhumans. He is fitted with a cybernetic gauntlet, high-powered weapons, and wears a mechanical device over one eye used for tracking and scoping out prey. He first appeared in X-Factor #65 and was created by Jim Lee, Chris Claremont and Whilce Portacio.
name: Gauntlet (Joseph Green)
powers: Cybernetically enhanced with various high-tech weapons
